title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water and drain.
2. In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy. Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
3. In a bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan.
4. Combine hot pasta with pancetta and garlic, then quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding reserved pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
5. Season with salt and pepper. Garnish with parsley and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala for at least 1 hour.
2. In a pan, sauté onion and garlic until soft. Add marinated chicken and cook until browned.
3. Stir in crushed tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes.
4. Add cream and cook for another 5 minutes. Season with salt.
5. Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.
